com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.model.repository

Interface ScRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Sc,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Sc>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Sc,java.lang.Long>

    public interface ScRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Sc,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Sc>
    CRUD repository for Sc Methods in this repository are defined in respect to many cases, where we are working with scs of an active and scs of an inactive user. Most of them were designed to handle active scs -> those have not additional javadoc

      • findAll

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<Sc> findAll()
        Deprecated. 
        Marked as deprecated, because we are working with both active and inactive scs, therefore we have to carefully decide which CRUD method should we use for certain action. Because of that, many custom methods were defined and should be used instead of fetching all Scs. findAll() is no prohibited to use, only has a special mark, so user shall reconsider its usage
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Sc,java.lang.Long>
        Returns:
        all entities
